thread.title: Rapper Scarface arrested for not paying child support
thread.title_full: Rapper Scarface arrested for not paying child support - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Rapper Scarface arrested for not paying child support
text:
Fulton Co. Sheriff's Office The Fulton County jail’s website said Scarface, 44, was arrested Friday. Rapper Scarface has been arrested for not making child support payments after being honored at the BET Hip-Hop Awards in Atlanta.
The Fulton County jail’s website said Scarface, 44, was arrested Friday. The Houston-based singer, whose real name is Brad Jordan, gave his acceptance speech for receiving the “I Am Hip Hop” award at the Boisfeuillet Jones Atlanta Civic Center.
Bond has been set at $482,190. An email to his representative was not returned.
Scarface is known for songs such as “Smile,” “My Block” and “I Seen a Man Die.”
Paras Griffin/BET/Getty Images for BET Networks Scarface accepts award onstage at the BET Hip Hop Awards Show 2015 at the Atlanta Civic Center on October 9, 2015.
